name: Little Red Riding Hood's Perpetual Punishment in Hell's Pizzeria
name_original: Little Red Riding Hood's Perpetual Punishment in Hell's Pizzeria
description:
For the crimes of forced entry and double homicide, Little Red Riding Hood is cast into firey purgatory and has to serve pizzas to every damned soul in hell. But the pizzas? They're not going down without a fight.

Movement - "WASD" keys, 

Look around - Mouse 

Shoot - Mouse Left Button

Change weapon - Scroll wheel up or down, Number keys from 1 to 5.

Each enemy is a Pizza Base. Shoot it with each weapon to prepare the pizza and finally finish it off with a blow from the flamethrowing RPG.

See how long you last!
